abstract: Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway bought more than 10 million shares of the railroad company Burlington Northern Santa Fe since Thursday, increasing its stake to 14.8 percent, according to regulatory filings.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway bought more than 10 million shares of the railroad company Burlington Northern Santa Fe since Thursday, increasing its stake to 14.8 percent, according to regulatory filings.
